game
Class Strategy_CPUMedium

java.lang.Object
  game.Strategy
      game.Strategy_CPUMedium

public class Strategy_CPUMedium
extends Strategy

An extension to the computer strategy. This one tries for the middle position first, then corners, then middle positions. I've also added a "delay" while the computer thinks.

Author:
Gavin, Mark
